review_text: App crashes every time I try to upload a photo. This started after the latest update. Using Samsung Galaxy S21, Android 13.
Amazing app! The new dark mode feature is exactly what I needed. Works perfectly on my iPhone 14.
Can't login since update. Keep getting 'Invalid credentials' error even though my password is correct. Very frustrating!
Would love to see a calendar integration feature. It would make scheduling so much easier!
Data sync not working at all. Lost all my notes from last week. This is unacceptable!
Love the new feature! Best productivity app I've used. Highly recommend to everyone.
Please add offline mode. I travel a lot and need to access my data without internet.
App is extremely slow since last update. Takes 30 seconds just to open. iPhone 12 Pro, iOS 17.
Too expensive for what it offers. $9.99/month is way too much. Consider lowering the price.
Great app but missing export to PDF feature. Would be perfect with that addition.
Constant crashes when switching between tabs. Pixel 7, Android 14. Please fix ASAP!
Works perfectly! No bugs, great UI, excellent customer support. Worth every penny.
Would be nice to have widget support for quick access from home screen.
App deleted all my data after update. No backup option available. Lost months of work!
Poor customer service. Sent 3 emails about my issue, no response yet. Very disappointed.
Incredible update! The new collaboration features are game-changing. Thank you!
Please add biometric authentication for better security. Face ID or fingerprint would be great.
Cannot attach files anymore. Error message: 'File format not supported' for all file types.
App needs better search functionality. Current search is too basic and slow.
Battery drain is insane! App uses 40% battery in 2 hours. iPhone 13, iOS 17.2.
Best app ever! Simple, intuitive, and powerful. Exactly what I was looking for.
Subscription model is confusing. Too many tiers, unclear what each includes.
Would love to see integration with Google Drive and Dropbox for cloud storage.
App won't open at all after iOS 17.3 update. Just shows white screen then crashes.
SPAM: Buy cheap watches at www.fakewatches.com! Best prices guaranteed!!!
Outstanding app! The team really listens to user feedback. Keep up the great work!
Please add dark theme for OLED screens. Current dark mode is not true black.
Notifications not working. Missing important reminders. iPad Pro, iPadOS 17.
Great app! Would be perfect with recurring task templates feature.
